INSERT INTO ord_claim ( ORD_NO , ORD_DTL_NO , CLAIM_TP , CLAIM_STUS , RFND_YN , TOT_RFND_AMT , CARD_RFND_AMT , RFND_PNT , REQR_ID , REQ_RSN , REQ_DTL_RSN , APRV_DTTM , APRVR_ID , CLAIM_PIC1 , CLAIM_PIC2 , CLAIM_PIC3 , REGR_ID)
SELECT ORD_NO # 주문번호 , #{ordDtlNo} # 주문상세번호 , #{claimTp} # 주문클레임 분류 , '17' # 주문클레임 처리상태 , #{rfndYn} # 환불완료여부(Y/N) , TOT_RFND_AMT # 총 환불금액 , LEAST(TOT_RFND_AMT, REAL_PAY_AMT) # 카드환불금액 , GREATEST(TOT_RFND_AMT - REAL_PAY_AMT, 0) # 반환포인트 , #{reqrId} # 요청자 , #{reqRsn} # 요청사유 , #{reqDtlRsn} # 요청상세사유 , #{aprvDttm} # 승인일시 , #{aprvrId} # 승인자 , #{claimPic1} # 사진1 , #{claimPic2} # 사진2 , #{claimPic3} # 사진3 , #{regrId} # 등록자 FROM (SELECT P.ORD_NO , GET_ORGN_PAY_AMT(TOT_PROD_AMT, P.CPN_ISS_NO) + IF(ALL_TOT_PROD_AMT > 50000 OR P.DLV_FEE > 0, 0, -3000) AS TOT_RFND_AMT , P.REAL_PAY_AMT FROM (SELECT OD.ORD_NO, GET_DC_PRC(OD.PROD_PRC, OD.PROD_DC_PER) * OD.QTY AS TOT_PROD_AMT FROM ORD_DTL OD WHERE OD.ORD_DTL_NO = #{ordDtlNo}) AS OD JOIN (SELECT ORD_NO, SUM(GET_DC_PRC(PROD_PRC, PROD_DC_PER) * QTY) AS ALL_TOT_PROD_AMT FROM ORD_DTL WHERE ORD_STUS NOT IN (70, 80, 90) GROUP BY ORD_NO) AS OT ON OD.ORD_NO = OT.ORD_NO JOIN PAY P ON OD.ORD_NO = P.ORD_NO WHERE P.PAY_STUS NOT IN (20, 30)) A;
